SelectStatement.Command: select apsu_suppid SetVen_SAGACode, apsu_lname SetVen_Name, apsp_postadd1 ||apsp_postadd2 ||apsp_postadd3 ||apsp_postadd4 SetVenAddress, apsp_postcode SetVen_Post, apsp_city SetVen_City, apsp_state SetVen_State, apsu_contact SetVen_Person, apsu_phone SetVen_Phone, apsu_fax SetVen_Fax, apsu_email SetVen_Email, apsu_acctno SetVen_AccountNumber from ap_supplier,ap_suppostal where apsu_suppid = apsp_suppid and apsu_company=apsp_company and apsu_company='HQ'
select glac_account,glac_desc from gl_account where glac_account matches '*$$$*'
